summary: Tested Module B4: Creator Health Score. Backend: 30/30 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI tests passed. Health score calculation, feature gating, component details, achievements, recommendations, and leaderboard all working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Requires authentication (401/403 without token)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history - Requires authentication
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/{component} - Requires authentication
GET /api/creators/health-leaderboard - Requires authentication
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Free creator gets access_denied=true with upgrade_message
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history - Free creator gets access_denied=true
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/engagement - Free creator gets access_denied=true
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Pro creator has full access (access_denied=false)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Returns correct structure (overall_score, status, components, trend, achievements, recommendations, calculated_at)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Overall score is 0-100 integer
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Status is one of: excellent, good, fair, needs_attention, critical
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Status includes label, color, emoji
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - All 5 components present (engagement, proposal_success, consistency, arris_utilization, profile_completeness)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Component weights sum to 100% (25+25+20+15+15)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Each component has score, weight, label, metrics
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Achievements have label, description, icon, earned flag
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Recommendations have component, title, action, impact (high/medium/low)
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Trend has direction (up/down/stable) and change value
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history - Returns history array and days count
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history?days=7 - Custom days parameter works
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history?days=100 - Max days capped at 90
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/engagement - Returns detailed breakdown with weight=25%
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/proposal_success - Returns detailed breakdown with weight=25%
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/consistency - Returns detailed breakdown with weight=20%
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/arris_utilization - Returns detailed breakdown with weight=15%
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/profile_completeness - Returns detailed breakdown with weight=15%
GET /api/creators/me/health-score/component/invalid_component - Returns 400 error
GET /api/creators/health-leaderboard - Returns leaderboard array with date
GET /api/creators/health-leaderboard - Names are masked with *** for privacy
GET /api/creators/health-leaderboard?limit=5 - Limit parameter works
GET /api/creators/me/health-score - Elite creator has full access
Status thresholds: excellent (>=85), good (>=70), fair (>=50), needs_attention (>=30), critical (<30)
Frontend: Free user sees upgrade prompt with 'Upgrade to Pro' button
Frontend: Pro user sees full health score dashboard with score ring
Frontend: Health score ring shows correct color based on status (red for critical)
Frontend: All 5 component cards visible with scores and progress bars
Frontend: Overview tab shows component cards
Frontend: Achievements tab shows earned badges or empty state message
Frontend: Actions tab shows recommendations with impact badges
Frontend: Component card click opens details modal
Frontend: Component details modal shows score, key metrics, and tip
Frontend: Elite user sees 'ELITE' badge and full dashboard access
Frontend: Refresh button present and functional
critical_code_review_comments: creator_health_score_service.py - Well-structured service with comprehensive health scoring algorithm
Health score calculation based on 5 weighted components: engagement (25%), proposal_success (25%), consistency (20%), arris_utilization (15%), profile_completeness (15%)
Status thresholds correctly implemented: excellent (>=85), good (>=70), fair (>=50), needs_attention (>=30), critical (<30)
Feature gating properly implemented - Free/Starter users get access_denied=true, Pro/Premium/Elite have full access
Achievements system tracks 8 badge types: first_proposal, five_approved, ten_approved, streak_7, streak_30, high_approval, arris_expert, complete_profile
Recommendations are personalized based on lowest scoring components with impact levels (high/medium/low)
Trend tracking stores daily scores for 7-day comparison
CreatorHealthScore.js - Clean React component with proper data-testid attributes
Health score ring visualization using SVG circles with color coding based on status
Component cards are clickable and open details modal with metrics and tips
Proper loading, error, and access denied states handled
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing test creators
context_for_next_testing_agent: Module B4 Creator Health Score fully tested. Key points: 1) All 4 endpoints tested and working. 2) Feature gating works correctly - Free/Starter see access_denied, Pro/Premium/Elite have full access. 3) Health score uses 5 weighted components totaling 100%. 4) Status thresholds: excellent (>=85), good (>=70), fair (>=50), needs_attention (>=30), critical (<30). 5) Component details modal shows metrics and tips. 6) Achievements and recommendations are personalized. 7) Leaderboard masks names for privacy. 8) Test creators have minimal data so scores are low (expected).

endpoints_tested: GET /api/creators/me/health-score/history - Historical scores for trend analysis
GET /api/creators/health-leaderboard - Top creators with masked names
